titles.title: Providing for consideration of a motion to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-309, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 104.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 281.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 253 - 172 (Roll no. 397).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/8/1999--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on September 9 or 10, 1999, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain a motion that the House suspend the rules and adopt H. Con. Res. 180 (presidential clemency to terrorists).
